summary.name: summary
summary.value: Zend_Form::_sort() depends on the __get magic method. But it should not.

description.name: description

value.body:
Overloading as a method of access to the elements was a design decision for this iteration of Zend_Form. We plan to revisit and reverse that decision... but it cannot happen until we can introduce BC breaks -- which will occur with 2.0.

If you want to help with that effort, please visit the [Zend_Form 2.0 planning page|http://framework.zend.com/wiki/display/ZFDEV2/Zend_Form+2.0] and provide feedback.
